Discussion: Work as a serial verb construction
[IMPORTANT] not every do.LV, but the ones with do + V-ing (e.g., do sculpting); neglect 'do anything'; search by using 'do\s\w+ing\b'
Kris Comment: So what do we do with the gerund? In most cases, we clearly have a verb phrase.

Discussion: check every instance of 'keep', not tagged as TRAN_RES
light verbs might not have checked (e.g., have a bath tagged as TRAN_S)
check every instance of 'leave', not tagged as TRAN_RES (e.g., leave him alone)
